mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.delivery_note_sid, t.delivery_note_code, t.company_sid, t.storehouse_sid, t.storehouse_location_sid, t.document_type, t.business_type, t.delivery_category, t.document_date, t.receiver_org, t.receiver_org_type, t.receiver_vendor_sid, t.receiver_customer_sid, t.receiver_shop_sid, t.is_multiple_orders, t.sale_purchase_mode, t.consignee, t.consignee_phone, t.consignee_addr, t.shipment_type, t.carrier_note_code, t.expected_arrival_date, t.shipping_point, t.credit_type, t.expected_ship_date, t.ship_date, t.arrival_date, t.in_out_stock_status, t.operator, t.sales_order_sid, t.purchase_order_sid, t.carrier, t.supplier_delivery_code, t.purchase_order_code, t.sales_order_code, t.consignee_addr_province_code, t.consignee_addr_province, t.consignee_addr_city_code, t.consignee_addr_city, t.consignee_addr_district_code, t.consignee_addr_district, t.other_system_in_out_stock_order, t.other_system_delivery_note_code, t.shipper, t.shipper_phone, t.shipper_addr_province_code, t.shipper_addr_province, t.shipper_addr_city_code, t.shipper_addr_city, t.shipper_addr_district_code, t.shipper_addr_district, t.shipper_addr, t.is_push_other_system1, t.push_result_other_system1, t.push_return_msg_other_system1, t.push_time_other_system1, t.is_push_other_system2, t.push_result_other_system2, t.push_return_msg_other_system2, t.push_time_other_system2, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t.shipping_order_code, t.is_direct_transport_followup, t.followup_business_type, t1.buyer, t1.purchase_org, t1.purchase_group, t1.vendor_sid, t2.vendor_code, t2.vendor_name, t3.company_code, t3.company_name, t1.product_season_sid, t4.product_season_code, t4.product_season_name, t5.storehouse_code, t5.storehouse_name, t6.location_code, t6.location_name, t6.other_system_storehouse_code, t7.nick_name, t8.name as document_type_name, t9.name as business_type_name, t10.name as shipment_type_name, t11.name as purchase_group_name, t12.vendor_code as carrier_code, t12.vendor_name as carrier_name, t13.vendor_name AS receiver_org_name, t13.vendor_code AS receiver_org_code from s_del_delivery_note t LEFT JOIN s_pur_purchase_order t1 on t1.purchase_order_sid = t.purchase_order_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t3 on t3.company_sid = t.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_storehouse t5 on t5.storehouse_sid = t.storehouse_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_storehouse_location t6 on t6.storehouse_location_sid = t.storehouse_location_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t2 on t2.vendor_sid = t1.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t4 on t4.product_season_sid = t1.product_season_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t7 on t7.user_name = t1.buyer LEFT JOIN s_con_doc_type_delivery_note t8 on t8.code = t.document_type LEFT JOIN s_con_bu_type_delivery_note t9 on t9.code = t.business_type LEFT JOIN s_con_shipment_mode t10 on t10.code = t.shipment_type LEFT JOIN s_con_purchase_group t11 on t11.code = t1.purchase_group LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t12 on t12.vendor_sid = t.carrier LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t13 ON t13.vendor_sid = t.receiver_org

SELECT t.client_id, t.delivery_note_sid, t.delivery_note_code, t.company_sid, t.storehouse_sid, t.storehouse_location_sid, t.document_type, t.business_type, t.delivery_category, t.is_finance_book_yfzg, t.is_finance_book_yszg, t.is_return_goods, t.document_date, t.receiver_org, t.receiver_org_type, t.receiver_vendor_sid, t.receiver_customer_sid, t.receiver_shop_sid, t.is_multiple_orders, t.sale_purchase_mode, t.consignee, t.consignee_phone, t.consignee_addr, t.shipment_type, t.carrier_note_code, t.expected_arrival_date, t.shipping_point, t.credit_type, t.expected_ship_date, t.ship_date, t.arrival_date, t.contact_party_remark, t.in_out_stock_status, t.operator, t.sales_order_sid, t.purchase_order_sid, t.carrier, t.supplier_delivery_code, t.purchase_order_code, t.sales_order_code, t.consignee_addr_province_code, t.consignee_addr_province, t.consignee_addr_city_code, t.consignee_addr_city, t.consignee_addr_district_code, t.consignee_addr_district, t.other_system_in_out_stock_order, t.other_system_delivery_note_code, t.shipper, t.shipper_phone, t.shipper_addr_province_code, t.shipper_addr_province, t.shipper_addr_city_code, t.shipper_addr_city, t.shipper_addr_district_code, t.shipper_addr_district, t.shipper_addr, t.is_push_other_system1, t.push_result_other_system1, t.push_return_msg_other_system1, t.push_time_other_system1, t.is_push_other_system2, t.push_result_other_system2, t.push_return_msg_other_system2, t.push_time_other_system2, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t.shipping_order_code, t1.sale_department, t1.sale_person, t1.business_channel, t.customer_sid, t1.product_season_sid, t2.customer_code, t2.customer_name, IFNULL(t2.short_name, t2.customer_name) as customer_short_name, t3.product_season_code, t3.product_season_name, t4.department_code, t4.department_name, t5.company_code, t5.company_name, IFNULL(t5.short_name, t5.company_name) as company_short_name, t6.storehouse_code, t6.storehouse_name, t7.location_code, t7.location_name, t7.other_system_storehouse_code, t8.buyer, t8.purchase_org, t8.purchase_group, t.vendor_sid, t15.vendor_name, IFNULL(t15.short_name, t15.vendor_name) as vendor_short_name, t9.nick_name AS buyer_name, t10.NAME AS document_type_name, t11.NAME AS business_type_name, t12.NAME AS shipment_type_name, t13.NAME AS business_channel_name, t14.vendor_code AS carrier_code, t14.vendor_name AS carrier_name, t16.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t17.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t18.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name, IFNULL(t19.vendor_name, t24.customer_name) AS receiver_org_name, IFNULL(t19.vendor_code, t24.customer_code) AS receiver_org_code, t20.create_date as account_date, t21.nick_name as storehouse_operator, t22.name as purchase_group_name, t23.name as purchase_org_name, t25.approval_node, t25.approval_user_id, t25.approval_user_name, t25.create_date AS submit_date, t26.nick_name AS submit_user_name FROM s_del_delivery_note t LEFT JOIN s_sal_sales_order t1 ON t1.sales_order_sid = t.sales_order_sid LEFT JOIN s_pur_purchase_order t8 ON t8.purchase_order_sid = t.purchase_order_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t5 ON t5.company_sid = t.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_storehouse t6 ON t6.storehouse_sid = t.storehouse_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_storehouse_location t7 ON t7.storehouse_location_sid = t.storehouse_location_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer t2 ON t2.customer_sid = t.customer_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t3 ON if(t.purchase_order_sid is null, t3.product_season_sid = t1.product_season_sid, t3.product_season_sid = t8.product_season_sid) LEFT JOIN s_bas_department t4 ON t4.department_sid = t1.sale_department LEFT JOIN sys_user t9 ON if(t.purchase_order_sid is null, t9.user_name = t1.sale_person, t9.user_name = t8.buyer) LEFT JOIN s_con_doc_type_delivery_note t10 ON t10.CODE = t.document_type LEFT JOIN s_con_bu_type_delivery_note t11 ON t11.CODE = t.business_type LEFT JOIN s_con_shipment_mode t12 ON t12.CODE = t.shipment_type LEFT JOIN s_con_business_channel t13 ON t13.CODE = t1.business_channel LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t14 ON t14.vendor_sid = t.carrier LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t15 ON t15.vendor_sid = t.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t16 ON t16.user_name = t.creator_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t17 ON t17.user_name = t.updater_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t18 ON t18.user_name = t.confirmer_account LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t19 ON t19.vendor_sid = t.receiver_org left join s_inv_inventory_document t20 on t20.refer_document_sid = t.delivery_note_sid and t20.document_type = 'CG' and t20.handle_status = 'B' LEFT JOIN sys_user t21 ON t21.user_name = t20.creator_account left join s_con_purchase_group t22 on t22.code = t8.purchase_group left join s_con_purchase_org t23 on t23.code = t8.purchase_org LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer t24 ON t24.customer_sid = t.receiver_org left join s_sys_form_process t25 on t25.form_id = t.delivery_note_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t26 ON t25.creator_account = t26.user_name left join s_con_bu_type_purchase_order t27 on t27.code = t8.business_type left join s_con_bu_type_sales_order t28 on t28.code = t1.business_type

select t.client_id, t.delivery_note_sid, t.delivery_note_code, t.company_sid, t.storehouse_sid, t.storehouse_location_sid, t.document_type, t.business_type, t.delivery_category, t.document_date, t.receiver_org, t.receiver_org_type, t.receiver_vendor_sid, t.receiver_customer_sid, t.receiver_shop_sid, t.is_multiple_orders, t.sale_purchase_mode, t.consignee, t.consignee_phone, t.consignee_addr, t.shipment_type, t.carrier_note_code, t.expected_arrival_date, t.shipping_point, t.credit_type, t.expected_ship_date, t.ship_date, t.arrival_date, t.in_out_stock_status, t.operator, t.sales_order_sid, t.purchase_order_sid, t.carrier, t.supplier_delivery_code, t.purchase_order_code, t.sales_order_code, t.consignee_addr_province_code, t.consignee_addr_province, t.consignee_addr_city_code, t.consignee_addr_city, t.consignee_addr_district_code, t.consignee_addr_district, t.other_system_in_out_stock_order, t.other_system_delivery_note_code, t.shipper, t.shipper_phone, t.shipper_addr_province_code, t.shipper_addr_province, t.shipper_addr_city_code, t.shipper_addr_city, t.shipper_addr_district_code, t.shipper_addr_district, t.shipper_addr, t.is_push_other_system1, t.push_result_other_system1, t.push_return_msg_other_system1, t.push_time_other_system1, t.is_push_other_system2, t.push_result_other_system2, t.push_return_msg_other_system2, t.push_time_other_system2, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.is_return_goods, t.is_finance_book_yfzg, t.is_finance_book_yszg, t.is_consignment_settle, t.inventory_control_mode, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t.contact_party_remark, t.is_direct_transport_followup, t.shipping_order_code, t1.sale_department, t1.sale_person, t1.business_channel, t.customer_sid, t1.product_season_sid, IFNULL(t1.delivery_type, t8.delivery_type) as delivery_type, t2.customer_code, t2.customer_name, IFNULL(t2.short_name, t2.customer_name) AS customer_short_name, t3.product_season_code, t3.product_season_name, t4.department_code, t4.department_name, t5.company_code, t5.company_name, t6.storehouse_code, t6.storehouse_name, t7.location_code, t7.location_name, t7.is_virtual, t7.other_system_storehouse_code, t.vendor_sid, t9.vendor_code, t9.vendor_name, IFNULL(t9.short_name, t9.vendor_name) AS vendor_short_name, t8.product_season_sid as shipments_product_season_sid, t10.product_season_code as shipments_product_season_code, t10.product_season_name as shipments_product_season_name, t11.nick_name as sale_person_name, t12.name as document_type_name, t13.name as business_type_name, t14.name as shipment_type_name, t15.name as business_channel_name, t16.vendor_code as carrier_code, t16.vendor_name as carrier_name, t17.nick_name as creator_account_name from s_del_delivery_note t LEFT JOIN s_sal_sales_order t1 on t1.sales_order_sid = t.sales_order_sid LEFT JOIN s_pur_purchase_order t8 on t8.purchase_order_sid = t.purchase_order_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t5 on t5.company_sid = t.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_storehouse t6 on t6.storehouse_sid = t.storehouse_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_storehouse_location t7 on t7.storehouse_location_sid = t.storehouse_location_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer t2 on t2.customer_sid = t.customer_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t3 on t3.product_season_sid = t1.product_season_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_department t4 on t4.department_sid = t1.sale_department LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t9 on t9.vendor_sid = t.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t10 on t10.product_season_sid = t8.product_season_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t11 on t11.user_name = t1.sale_person LEFT JOIN s_con_doc_type_delivery_note t12 on t12.code = t.document_type LEFT JOIN s_con_bu_type_delivery_note t13 on t13.code = t.business_type LEFT JOIN s_con_shipment_mode t14 on t14.code = t.shipment_type LEFT JOIN s_con_business_channel t15 on t15.code = t1.business_channel LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t16 on t16.vendor_sid = t.carrier LEFT JOIN sys_user t17 on t17.user_name = t.creator_account

select t.client_id, t.delivery_note_sid, t.delivery_note_code, t.receiver_org, t.receiver_org_type, t.receiver_vendor_sid, t.receiver_customer_sid, t.receiver_shop_sid, t.consignee, t.consignee_phone, t.consignee_addr, t.shipment_type, t.carrier_note_code, t.expected_arrival_date, t.purchase_order_sid, t.carrier, t.supplier_delivery_code, t.purchase_order_code, t14.name as shipment_type_name, t16.vendor_code as carrier_code, t16.vendor_name as carrier_name from s_del_delivery_note t LEFT JOIN s_pur_purchase_order t8 on t8.purchase_order_sid = t.purchase_order_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_shipment_mode t14 on t14.code = t.shipment_type LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t16 on t16.vendor_sid = t.carrier
mapper.insert:
insert into s_del_delivery_note
client_id, delivery_note_sid, delivery_note_code, document_type, business_type, delivery_category, document_date, consignee, consignee_phone, consignee_addr, shipment_type, carrier_note_code, customer_sid, vendor_sid, receiver_vendor_sid, receiver_customer_sid, receiver_shop_sid, is_multiple_orders, sale_purchase_mode, expected_arrival_date, shipping_point, credit_type, expected_ship_date, ship_date, arrival_date, in_out_stock_status, operator, sales_order_sid, purchase_order_sid, carrier, supplier_delivery_code, purchase_order_code, sales_order_code, consignee_addr_province_code, consignee_addr_province, consignee_addr_city_code, consignee_addr_city, consignee_addr_district_code, consignee_addr_district, other_system_in_out_stock_order, other_system_delivery_note_code, shipper, shipper_phone, shipper_addr_province_code, shipper_addr_province, shipper_addr_city_code, shipper_addr_city, shipper_addr_district_code, shipper_addr_district, shipper_addr, is_push_other_system1, push_result_other_system1, push_return_msg_other_system1, push_time_other_system1, is_push_other_system2, push_result_other_system2, push_return_msg_other_system2, push_time_other_system2, remark, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys, shipping_order_code,
values
#{o.clientId}, #{o.deliveryNoteSid}, #{o.deliveryNoteCode}, #{o.documentType}, #{o.businessType}, #{o.deliveryCategory}, #{o.documentDate}, #{o.consignee}, #{o.consigneePhone}, #{o.consigneeAddr}, #{o.shipmentType}, #{o.carrierNoteCode}, #{o.customerSid}, #{o.vendorSid}, #{o.receiverVendorSid}, #{o.receiverCustomerSid}, #{o.receiverShopSid}, #{o.isMultipleOrders}, #{o.salePurchaseMode}, #{o.expectedArrivalDate}, #{o.shippingPoint}, #{o.creditType}, #{o.expectedShipDate}, #{o.shipDate}, #{o.arrivalDate}, #{o.inOutStockStatus}, #{o.operator}, #{o.salesOrderSid}, #{o.purchaseOrderSid}, #{o.carrier}, #{o.supplierDeliveryCode}, #{o.purchaseOrderCode}, #{o.salesOrderCode}, #{o.consigneeAddrProvinceCode}, #{o.consigneeAddrProvince}, #{o.consigneeAddrCityCode}, #{o.consigneeAddrCity}, #{o.consigneeAddrDistrictCode}, #{o.consigneeAddrDistrict}, #{o.otherSystemInOutStockOrder}, #{o.otherSystemDeliveryNoteCode}, #{o.shipper}, #{o.shipperPhone}, #{o.shipperAddrProvinceCode}, #{o.shipperAddrProvince}, #{o.shipperAddrCityCode}, #{o.shipperAddrCity}, #{o.shipperAddrDistrictCode}, #{o.shipperAddrDistrict}, #{o.shipperAddr}, #{o.isPushOtherSystem1}, #{o.pushResultOtherSystem1}, #{o.pushReturnMsgOtherSystem1}, #{o.pushTimeOtherSystem1}, #{o.isPushOtherSystem2}, #{o.pushResultOtherSystem2}, #{o.pushReturnMsgOtherSystem2}, #{o.pushTimeOtherSystem2}, #{o.remark}, #{o.handleStatus}, #{o.creatorAccount}, #{o.createDate}, #{o.updaterAccount}, #{o.updateDate}, #{o.confirmerAccount}, #{o.confirmDate}, #{o.dataSourceSys}, #{o.shippingOrderCode},
mapper.delete:
delete from s_del_delivery_note where delivery_note_sid in
#{deliveryNoteSid}
mapper.update:
update s_del_delivery_note
handle_status = #{handleStatus}, confirmer_account = #{confirmerAccount}, confirm_date = #{confirmDate},
where delivery_note_sid in (#{deliveryNoteSid})
